message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go as low as $8,200. How about we split the difference and settle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
